description:
Dakota is a country boy. Raised up on a farm, he still works mostly outdoors doing construction. Hence the farmer's tan.
He identifies as straight, but has a curiosity about getting fucked by a dude. We talked about, and I think it has more to do with him exploring his body at a young age. He found out his ass gave him as much pleasure, and always likes it played it, BUT he just never was in to guys.
So he's a little confused how he can want his ass played with, but not be in to the guy thing, then still wanting to be fucked by a dude.
Maybe we can join him in the exploration. He seems very shy about it, and he says he's never ever been fucked, and might try it for the first time on camera.
But I have a feeling he's gonna try it on his own first.
In the mean time, I'm gonna see if I can get him to come back and do more. I think he is adorable and think it would be cool to see him grow up right here on the site.
title: Dakota - Solo
